footer.disclaimer: This is not an official Government website. For more information about the COVID pass, please go to https://nzcp.covid19.health.nz

invalidCodes.expired: Sorry, it looks like you COVID pass has expired. Please contact the [Ministry of Health]({{link}})
invalidCodes.invalid: Sorry, we could not verify your COVID pass. Please contact the [Ministry of Health]({{link}})
invalidCodes.notAcovidPass: Sorry, this doesn't look to be a COVID pass. Please contact the [Ministry of Health]({{link}})
